Create a luggage tag with a built-in GPS tracker: This would allow travelers to easily locate their luggage in real-time, reducing the stress and anxiety that often comes with traveling. The GPS tracker would be integrated into the design of the luggage tag, making it both functional and stylish.

Design a luggage tag with a built-in charging port: This would allow travelers to charge their phone or other electronic devices on the go, without the need for a separate power bank or outlet. The charging port would be designed to be waterproof and durable, making it perfect for use in a variety of environments.

Create a luggage tag with a built-in translator: This would allow travelers to communicate with locals in the language they are most comfortable with, reducing the barriers that can often arise when traveling to new places. The translator would be designed to be easy to use and would include a range of languages to choose from.

Design a luggage tag with a built-in camera: This would allow travelers to capture memories of their trips and adventures, without the need for a separate camera or phone. The camera would be designed to be compact and easy to use, and would include a range of features to make it easy to take photos and videos.

Create a luggage tag with a built-in lock: This would allow travelers to keep their luggage secure and protect their belongings from theft or damage. The lock would be designed to be easy to use and would include a range of security features to ensure that only the owner has access to the luggage.
